Title: Parasang Region
Description:
[h1]Overview[/h1]

Adds a letter to parasang names to indicate which of the 9 regions (zones) the player character is in.

[h1]Details[/h1]

This is an alternative to "Show Parasang" mod. "Parasang Region" works correctly with game version 1.0, and the zone name changes are not permanent.

The markers are:

[code]
NW | N | NE
---+---+---
 W | C | E
---+---+---
SW | S | SE
[/code]

[h1]Uninstall[/h1]

The mod is safe to add or remove at any point.
